revised_title: Mapping the Neural Control of Circulation and Respiration in the 4th Ventricle
tldr: The authors investigate the effects of electrical stimulation on the floor of the 4th ventricle in relation to circulation and respiration. They find specific areas responsible for controlling inspiration, expiration, respiratory rhythm, cardio-inhibition, and blood pressure changes. Their findings provide a map of the neural control of these functions within the medulla oblongata.
